extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Health Foods
extendedIngredients.name: honey

recipes.title: Chicken with a Pomegranate and Balsamic Reduction

winePairing.pairingText: Chicken can be paired with Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, and Sauvignon Blanc. White meat is typically paired with white wine as to not overpower the flavor of the meat, so chardonnay and sauvignon blanc are safe choices. Chicken prepared with a tomato sauce or certainly a red wine sauce can and should be served with a red like a pinot noir. You could try Waterbrook Reserve Chardonnay. Reviewers quite like it with a 5 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 20 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Waterbrook Reserve Chardonnay
productMatches.description: Beautiful and golden in color, this chardonnay has persistent ripe pear and lychee flavors that are complemented by a subtle, sweet toasty oak. Very balanced acid harmonizes the thick viscosity of this ripe and decadent wine.

recipes.instructions: InstructionsPreheat oven to 350FCut chicken in half through the thickness to make 12 breasts.Salt and pepper the chicken generouslyHeat the olive oil until it ripples.Add the chicken sear on one side, and then turn and sear on the other. Repeat until all the chicken is done.Set aside.Add the onion and garlic to the pan and cook slowly until they caramelize.Remove the onion mixture from the pan and set aside.Add the balsamic, pomegranate, and honey to the pan. Simmer until the mixture is reduced and syrupy.Taste and adjust seasoning. Pour the reduction over the chicken in and spoon the onions over.  Bake for 15 minutes or until thermometer registers 165F

steps.step: Cut chicken in half through the thickness to make 12 breasts.Salt and pepper the chicken generously
Heat the olive oil until it ripples.
Add the chicken sear on one side, and then turn and sear on the other. Repeat until all the chicken is done.Set aside.
Add the onion and garlic to the pan and cook slowly until they caramelize.
Remove the onion mixture from the pan and set aside.
Add the balsamic, pomegranate, and honey to the pan. Simmer until the mixture is reduced and syrupy.Taste and adjust seasoning.
Pour the reduction over the chicken in and spoon the onions over.
Bake for 15 minutes or until thermometer registers 165F
